website_summaries.verdict: The pricey Beats Solo2 Wireless headphones offer sculpted, but balanced, Bluetooth audio.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass and well-defined highs
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Not for purists seeking flat response

customer_reviews.title: Photo curtesy of Apple
customer_reviews.text: FAKE FAKE FAKE. These are not genuine beats headphones. I bought these under the impression they were authentic. I started having problems with them so I opened a service request with Apple to have them repaired under warranty. When I went to check the status of my service I found the nice little photo of my headphones labeled as a fake unit. I called Apple to ask how they determined they were fake, and I was told it was because of how they were constructed and materials used. So unless you want a fake product do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Only if you've got money to blow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to do hours of homework and studying. Proceed with caution. The negatives: Gives me a brutal headache after an hour or so of listening, ridiculously overpriced, and glitches occasionally (buttons don't work, etc.) way overpriced and too much bass sound. I cannot workout or run in them because they will fall off my head. The positives: color and appearance is really nice looking. Blocks out sound and background noise, so great if you're studying in a noisy place or a coffee shop (this was the number one thing I was looking for). I like the wireless feature so I can clean and walk around without carrying my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT UPDATE: I am now 3 days away from the two month mark and one of the headphones (ear pieces) completely doesn't work. Amazon won't let me return the item because I'm more than 7 days out. The aux cord gave in one month, it took less than two for the headphones to not work. What a shame Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wright

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Sound qhaulity is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Sound qhaulity is fantastic. Holds a charge for hours. I bought this as a gift for one of my kids - and they are SO much better than the cheap alternative I got for myself. I'm hoping my wife reads this review and buys me a pair for Chrstmas... I knocked one star toff because they *are* very expensive there are alterbatives out there which are maybe $50 less expensive and probably just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless stop working after 15 months
customer_reviews.text: Update on 9/14/17: Completely disappointed after 1.5 years even after careful use it stopped working wireless capability. I charged the battery and trying to switch on the headphone set but it's not switching on. After spending $ 200+ dollars I wished it was working few yeas at minimum. Do not recommend it for anyone. Great sound quality i like it. It it was light wight and microphone was powerful i would have to easily give 5 start. Most of the time people from the other side cannot hear me when i use the build-in mic.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjaya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these almost everyday, sometimes twice a day, in the gym for the last 6 months, and they are awesome. The battery lasts forever; I only have to charge them maybe once every 2 weeks, and they charge fast. The button on the side can pause, skip track (double click), turn the volume up/down, and scan for Bluetooth when trying to connect. No problems with them falling off unless I'm hanging almost upside down, and even then they stay on most of the time. They block out noise really well. These headphones were definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is a delay from phone to headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife so she could work out without having a cord at the gym and possibly get wrapped around the weights and pull the cord so that it pulls the headphones off her head. The complaint that she has about these is that there is a time delay from the music to the headset about 2 seconds so even making phone calls it is slightly delayed and it is an annoyance for her. Other than that they were great they fit right and the colors are exactly as the picture shows. The battery life on these does not last long so you must charge everyday if you expect to use them the next day
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Worst of all
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two pairs or Solo2s from different Amazon merchants. Both of them were fraudulent as confirmed by the Apple Store. The SNs on the box did not match the SNs on the headphones. The "b" logos were slightly different when compared to an authentic pair. On one pair LEDs illuminated a slightly different shade. Worst of all, the sound quality was inferior.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: My review of Beats Solo2 Wireless Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My son was very pleased with these and he loves the wireless feature. He has owned earlier versions of Beats Headphones. It has great sound quality and the color is beautiful. It arrived quickly which was nice because this was his birthday gift. The headphones are comfortable and don't squeeze your head like a vice. The set up instructions are user friendly. The headphones pair easily with other devices. No complaints so far. Pros- Beautiful color finish - Excellent sound quality - Pairs easily with other devices - Very comfortable - Arrived sooner than expected Cons- Very expensive but worth the investment. This is a quality set of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THE ONE OF SPEAKERS GOING OUT
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this owned these for 13 months. The sound is good, the blue tooth is awesome and the battery life is crazy. But as today(day I am writing the review the left headphone went out. After searching around Google and YouTube I found this is a very common problem. It appears that the speaker wire comes undone. there are many DIY videos on how to fix but for $220 this should not happen. From the looks of all the reviews it seems a matter of when not if this will happen..
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Damn what a disappointment. My beats are great. Thought I would upgrade to wireless. Had nothing but problems. The sound kept cutting in and out nonstop like a cord was plugged in but loose....even though there is no cord. The sound wasn't as good as the plug in beats. I ended up returning for the Beats Studio Wireless...and those were a disappointment too. Returned those and ended up buying 50. cheap headphones that work great. Sometimes just because you pay a lot of money doesn't mean you get a good value unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Anway

customer_reviews.title: Believe or Don't Believe the HYPE
customer_reviews.text: Finally got me a Beats headphone.Well, my wife actually paid for it.I would never ride the subway or walk around the city streets with this on just using it at home.Yes sound quality is good. lots of bass for Dancehall Reggae, Soca, Dance mixes.I love the idea of blasting it in the comfort of my sofa.If you have the money or can get it as a gift do so.Best part is that it's wireless. Is it a must have, Not really.Mostly HYPE.
customer_reviews.author: Harlem Soul

customer_reviews.title: At first I was hesitant because these are only known to be good with specific type of music
customer_reviews.text: I had been tracking this item for months before I decided to bite the bullet and just make the purchase. At first I was hesitant because these are only known to be good with specific type of music, but after researching I determined that these are the ones I want anyways. Great decision, no hiccups with the wireless, the audio is amazing (hardly do I need to crank the volume all the way up) and they stay out throughout my workouts/cardio. I would recommend these to anyone, they are not just regular headphones with a popular logo on the side....these are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: gixxer528@gmail

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: They are so soft and comfortable. The sound is clear and no one has issues speaking to me when I'm on the phone. The battery life lasts quite a while for me as well. I purchased from Amazon because I saw them in Verizon but Verizon wanted $200 for them and Apple wanted $300 for them. This way I ordered them through Amazon but through Beats as well. The quality is clear for me. The only issue I have is that I have very long hair that I wear down a lot, my hair gets twisted and twirled around the part that goes on your ears. Other than that, I love them. I can't leave the house without them.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. The sound is incredible, much better than the skull candy headphones that I've been using for years. Also the cable is high quality so it won't break after a month (like skull candy's). Wireless feature is amazing along with the on headset controls. Would Recommend. Only downfall is the price but in the end I have probably paid more buying 40 pairs of skull candy's that break than one set of reliable headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Primemember3

customer_reviews.title: These are great. You're definitely paying a little bit extra for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the studio wireless and wanted a smaller profile. These are great. You're definitely paying a little bit extra for the name, but it's worth it for the design. I wear these for at least a couple of hours every day, and I don't want to look like a moron. They're every bit as good as the previous generation, and a little bit better for the smaller ear piece and easier adjustment. They were great for working out as well, I regularly run 3+ miles with them. The only thing I would say makes the studio wireless superior is the earpiece is slightly softer, but I'm sure these will break-in in time.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: and they were good, but the wireless ones are where its at
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the wired Beats, and they were good, but the wireless ones are where its at! I have a very small house and can put my phone with all my music in the center of my house and I can go one about my business cleaning, laundry whatever, and not have to worry about having a pocket for holding my phone..If you love listening to music as much as I do, these are a necessity. And I have received many compliments on the rose gold color as well..
customer_reviews.author: heatherjae911

customer_reviews.title: Busted Beast Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I was had, these headphones are a knock-off and an embarrassment. What ever you listen to with the least amount of volume, your neighbor can hear. The material covering the speakers is starting to pull away from the foam insulation. The headphones are three years old, rarely used, and when they were not in use I kept them in the case. Not everything sold on Amazon is authentic ... silly of me to think so. Do your Research, lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Neville

customer_reviews.title: If you're interested in $200 headphones that will break in under 6 months...
customer_reviews.text: Then I have the deal for you! Order now and you can get these $240 headphones that will break from normal wear & tear in 5 1/2 months! The sound quality is not worth $200, and though the battery life is excellent, there are better headphones for far cheaper. On to massdrop.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Sold USEd Beets as New!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these headphones I thought I was buying a brand new set!!!!!! These headphones weren’t working after a week. I went to the Apple store and when they put the serial number it , the beets showed they were bought in 11/18 with a long list if complaints and trouble shooting!!!! I purchased them from Amazon on 12/16/18 I was so upset !!! Apple as great as they are said they would exchange them for me since they were Under warranty I will NEVER buy something like that from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Lisica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Beats Solo 2 for my daughter: Pros: WIRELESS Battery time Quality sound Comes with case easy to sync to all devices comfortable Cons: The case was a tight fit. You may want to invest in getting a little larger one. I would totally recommend these to my friends as long as you don't mind headphones that go over the ears. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: A Donahue

customer_reviews.title: The direction of smartphones are going towards wireless headphones and these are a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: These beats are a revolution and compliment my iphone 7 so well. I don't need to blast my music to cancel the noise from the environment and people around me can't tell what I am listening to. I wear them at the gym, work, and running outside. They stay in place and I am a HUGE fan. They are a bit on the pricier side, but worth it. The direction of smartphones are going towards wireless headphones and these are a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: MVP (pj) 23

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if u live in cold climate
customer_reviews.text: Nice sounding. I would give 5 stars but they quit working when it’s cold, I like to listen while I plow snow with my Kubota. My Studios never quit in the cold, if you like to listen in the cold I recommend the studios, wish I could have gotten the studios again, well live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!Go for Bose instead!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Every time i connect to my Macbook, it shows connected but does not really connect because i can still hear music coming from Mac speakers and not headphones. To test if it was an issue with Macbook, i tested Bose wireless and there was no issue! This has been happening since a month and im fed up with this device! Honestly, I bought Beats because of the hype, but glad that my husband bought Bose. Nothing beats Bose I guess!
customer_reviews.author: Dhwani Parikh

customer_reviews.title: To buy or not to buy . . .
customer_reviews.text: Love the phones . . . especially the wired or . . . wireless feature. I noticed some of the other reviewers who ordered Siren Red claimed they were pink. They are not bright red nor pink - more like soft watermelon red. I like the color. The setup was a breeze - no issues with Mac Air, iPhone or iMac set-up. My GF has a set of Bose QC-2s so . . . we simultaneously listened to the same song from different iPhones. The QC-2s sounded better but then they do cost more and are not wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Help me Mr. Wizard !

customer_reviews.title: Cannot say enough good things about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about these headphones. They fit well and the sound is excellent. Pretty good Bluetooth distance. The charge seems to last around 12 hours of use and I love having the option to hardwire if you can't charge them. The headset works well for phone calls as well. Speech is clear and no static noises noticed during the call. My only concern is with the leather on the earphones, I wonder if it will hold up with frequent exposure to sweat from workouts. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome audio quality, heavy bass. Be sure to keep an eye on what you are actually getting- the studio headphones I understand are a more "matte" musical tone (there is no built in leveling), but these are designed to beef up the low end. EDC and Dubstep sound great through these, but as a heavy metal fan I have no complaints about the way they pump Manowar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ear foam on head set peeling
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for less than a year before the cover on the ear foam started to come off. Two years in they are now completely off and the "b" on the side of the head phones has lost its color and is now chrome.. I paid $235 and this isn't good enough for the price. Sound is fine, I won't be buying again because of the quality of the build.
customer_reviews.author: Kodak Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit merchandise
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are counterfeit. They quit working, and when I tried to get them replaced with Apple, I was told that the serial number was invalid and had been reported as replaced in the past. The serial number on the box was different from the number on the headphones. Poor quality, fake merchandise. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jacalyn D  MD

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is amazing. Then the plastic adjuster
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is amazing. Then the plastic adjuster, where the earpiece snaps breaks! Still under warranty but Apple wants $129.99 to repair. I think Apple had one to many claims on this faulty design piece so they said, nope, we will no longer cover this. Thank goodness I bought Asurion protection. The price was right when I bought it, during black Friday.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Former Bose loyalist
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I've only bought Bose speakers/headphones for the last ten years. The latest wireless headphone by Bose got bad reviews so I decided to try Beats. They are great. I use them while I exercise or do household chores. The range is incredible. I can walk from room to room in the house and the sound remains great. The phone reception is also very good. My friends says they hear me just fine as I speak. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alena R. Shifrin

customer_reviews.title: Rose Gold Beauty with Wireless Ease
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for the lady after seeing them at the Apple Store; she wants to switch to all rose gold devices now. She had never used Bluetooth devices before but figured it out on her own. Her primary use is in bed with the iPad once I settle down for bed to watch Netflix or other entertainment. She loves the wireless freedom and the sound quality of the Beats are good. Recommend using a price watching tool to grab these below retail price.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great, but not if you will be wearing them with glasses
customer_reviews.text: If you wear glasses, you probably don't want these. I thought on-ear would be better than over-the-ear with glasses, but I was wrong at least as far as these are concerned. They press pretty strongly against the ear, which gets uncomfortable after a while when you are wearing glasses. Aside from that, they sound good and work well.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Spicer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged my Bose QC35s for these and am very pleased overall. I like how these fit better than the Bose headphones, which were too loose IMO. These have a much snugger fit on the head so they don't get jostled around as easily when you are moving. Sound quality is also better since there is no active noise cancelling. Where these fall short compared to the QC35s is battery life, but I think 12 hours is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: tacomahn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and isolation
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my wife - who loves them. Works exactly as advertised. Make sure you keep the battery topped off for longest life. Great sound and isolation. She previously used noise-cancelling bose headsets and feels this is comparable. update - 2017-07-02 - batteries have died, slowly over the last 2 weeks - will not take a charge. headphones are about 18 months old fortunately we purchased the protection plan from asurion and they're going to get them fixed/replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Rich

customer_reviews.title: "How the Producer intended for their Music to be heard"
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely marvelous. If you buy these, you will not regret anything about them. Every day of the week ... I have listened to my music with these. These were created for how the producers intended their music to be heard. Get them ... get them now!
customer_reviews.author: E. Ottieno

customer_reviews.title: Great price but not in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: These arrived early but the earpiece was separated and non working when they arrived. I was able to repair them but not super happy that they weren't in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ford

customer_reviews.title: Green light 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: In no way am I an audiophile though. I bought beats simply because they look good, and they have a lot of bass I wanted for my music. They sound exceptionally. These are REAL, the case they come with is made with a softer material, so I recommend getting a new tougher case. But overall I am thrilled. I got the gold colored beats and I have received lots of compliments on them. The price was nice and I would absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for purchasing the headphones was for the wireless capability, and certainly the bluetooth connection works fine. In addition to this, I feel the sound quality is the best I have ever heard with either in ear buds, over the ear, or on the ear. The tones are crisp and clean throughout the entire tonal range. The fit is excellent with a tight seal on the ears without being forced. The overall feel of the headphones is solid and high quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nazdar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Great quality of sound and best price!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was over the moon on these headphones! Her last pair the wires were broken by one of her siblings so she wanted a wireless set. Beats is the number one choice for the teens so of course that is what she wanted. Amazon had the best price available and I love shopping here as easy no hassle returns and great customer service. I listened to the sound quality of these and have to admit they are awesome! Maybe she will let me borrow them!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Lucky

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was great and they arrived exactly when they were supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the over the ear style headphone. These hurt my ears after wearing them for 30+ minutes and they made my ears sweat while sitting in my living room in the air conditioning. The sound quality was great and they arrived exactly when they were supposed to. My only knock is how they fit my head and how the felt over my ears. I returned them with no problems whatsoever and ended up buying the Beats Studio 2.0 wired over the ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Crowe

customer_reviews.title: If you love music and don't want to be attached to something, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what my daughter wanted for Christmas. She's 19 and in college and spends a lot of time on buses and walking around campus and didn't want to be attached to her backpack via cord all of the time. So she LOVES these. The sound quality is amazing and it was VERY easy to hook them up to her phone. Would buy them a million times over again and they are well worth the hefty price!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter love me again....
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my teenage daughter for Christmas and she LOVES these. I am an audiophile and while I didn't want to get them for her, they seemed exactly what she was looking for. They appear to be well made, collapse nicely, and sound pretty good. Overall I am very happy with the purchase and my daughter thinks I'm awesome for getting them for her... so 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Wiseweasel

customer_reviews.title: This company is selling FAKE products!
customer_reviews.text: This company sent me a fake headphone set of the Solo3 Beats. It was a cheap fake copy. Everything was working and I was ok with it. I was surprised that the mic quality was bad and that there was a humming sound sometimes but it was ok. THEN I went to an Apple store and saw the REAL ONES!!!! Completely different quality and completely different finishes. A CLEAR FAKE COPY.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: Not worth cost over time
customer_reviews.text: Right headphone experienced a short and now the headphones are similar to a Cyclops. What a waste of money. No-one fixes these and they're not made like the rest so I can't fix myself. I expect suck expensive headphones to be better made. And for some reason Amazon isn't offering a return/replacement. Really sucks
customer_reviews.author: Julian Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out. Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I finally went from earbuds to these for my workouts. They are incredible. The sound difference is incredible. The bass is great - the depth of the music is great. Overall just a great sound. Frankly I cannot believe they are wireless, given the sound. Definitely worth the money. I mean - they're expensive - but I've always bought expensive headphones (earbuds) and these are pricey - but the sound is second to none IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: I've had these for a while and I love them but I wish that the leather around the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while and I love them but I wish that the leather around the speakers didn't rip so fast. Again I've had these for a while at least a year or a year and a half but still I wish the material would last longer than that. The sound is great and I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones for certain genres of music.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these headphones, and I really enjoy them for hip-hop, rap, and techno music. I also have a pair of V-Modas that I adore equally. They are both about the same price, and I honestly would rank them equally within each of their designated music genres. I use the V-Modas mainly for classical, rock, and punk music, while I use the Beats for music with a strong drop and base line. I also love that the Beats are wireless because they are easier to exercise with than the wired ones. Their sleek design paired with their unique sound quality make this product worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schmid

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with USB Cable to charge headset, ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with USB Cable to charge headset, so I had to use my friends Beats charging cable. Once they were charged they only had sound coming out of both earphones if they were plugged into phone. If you tried use them wirelessly the left side had no sound! They are junk and I am waiting to hear back from the seller because I want a full refund!! I have no response!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLeisureMelrose

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headset for the money.
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it, wireless headphones with great look, sounds, and they pair with all my devices quickly without issues. I needed headphones for gym, running, work, relaxation and I'm tried of earphones. From all other choices in wireless selection without going over that $225 Beats filled my needs and budget. Gold color and white looks super nice, material feels comfortable against my ear. I can't complain and find any negative things with Beats so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal in great sound!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised! Great wireless sound. Stream from all Bluetooth devices. Not great for the gym as the ear covers will get warm over your ear if you're sweating. But as far as sound? Awesome. Great for chilling out with a great playlist . And if you have Apple Music ? There are NO limits to your listening pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Souza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these headphones. They sound great, they work great and I've had no issues with the color peeling off. I use these instead of ear buds because even the cleanest buds seem to encourage ear infections for me, so I'm very happy there is a wireless version so I don't pull the cord out on the elliptical!
customer_reviews.author: SuperGirl33

customer_reviews.title: Good in the beginning and then...
customer_reviews.text: The material around the ear piece/cup started to separate after less than 4 months of use. For the price/brand, I expected more from these. There is also a lot of sound leakage even at low to medium volumes. The only pro seems to be the bluetooth range. I would not recommend these to prospective buyers; look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: YvonneLynne

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was pretty good, but no matter how good
customer_reviews.text: Its too heavy as weight and way too much pressure on my head. I could not wear this thing for more than 15 min before having to take it off. Sound quality was pretty good, but no matter how good, if its too heavy and too much pressure on my ear, I won't be able to use. If they can design these headphones to be a little lighter, I will reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Pheng Cha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones~my friend already had the blk one so I knew the functions and its quality~ I wanted to get the gold but the price difference for me didnt seem like it was worth it... The white seems a little too plain but... Its still good ^^
customer_reviews.author: Ji Young Na

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the color
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the color. I ordered Siren red, which in my opinion looks (from pictures of item) like a bright red color. In all actuality, it is salmon (on the pinkish side) and grey, not red and black! When ordered, there was never a mention of the red looking pink but I see now, pink has been added to the description! I feel a bit deceived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but these just drove me nuts ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but these just drove me nuts. They looked and felt cheaper than I thought they would as soon as they got here. I thought oh well but the real issue is charging them. The charging issue started immediately and I should have known to try and return them earlier. They wouldn't hold a very long charge for the first couple of months and the past couple of months they won't charge at all. I've tried everything I can think of to get them to charge. Now I'm too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great look, great sound. These are built sturdy. Easy to connect to my phone too. I was very happy with how well they stayed in place when running on a treadmill. The only downside I had was when laying back lifting weights they slid around a little. I didn't bump them at all and I'm a big guy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected from beats
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son for his birthday. They are true to color. Excellent sound quality. He only has to charge them every few days & that doesn't take very long. In fact, I like to borrow them when I vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lindsley

customer_reviews.title: These earphones are the best. Not only do I love the color
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are the best. Not only do I love the color, but it's ability to connect to my smartphone, my computer, and other Bluetooth connection wirelessly, and play my favorite music when I want, whenever I want. Thank you to Beats Solo for creating this and thank you to the seller for providing with top notch quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The right side of the headphones stopped working after a few months of use. I only use them at home in bed. I’d expect better quality for the price. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomchita

customer_reviews.title: the sound is excellent and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to work out at the gym and have been loving them so far. The battery lasts a surprisingly long time, the sound is excellent and they are very comfortable. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stacks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: When I called beats they looked up by serial number and said they had already been returned twice for being defective :(
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were great, however
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great, however, they broke after 13 months. I have to pay over 3/4 of what I bought to fix them, and the warranty ran out after one year. I am very disappointed in these headphones. After talking with Apple Customer Service, we attempted a reset-didn’t work. We could send them in for a repair at a cost of $129. No other options were available to us. For this price, I’d expect headphones to last longer than 13 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love beats
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love it she had hers stolen on vacation so we were happy to find ones just like the one she had stolen in the same color good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot especially for workouts - I can move freely without getting tangled with my earphone wire. Sound isn't that superb but it's alright. It's more on the fashionable side definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: HOW CAN YOU SELL COUNTERFEIT MERCHANDISE?
customer_reviews.text: The product sold to me was not beats and therefore now when they are damaged a year before the manufacturer warranty expired I couldn't get them repaired. Apple tells me they are counterfeit and there is nothing they can do and the Square Trade warranty that I purchased online is also garbage. DO NOT PURCHASE BEATS AT AMAZON go straight to Apple and purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beats are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great! They broke easily at no fault of their own really.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY THROUGH APPLE ON THESE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware. No warranty through Apple on these items due to the fact Apple goes off manufacture date not purchase date. Son got these for Christmas 2017. Took them to Apple for repair after they broke in April. Told they are out of warranty regardless on when they were purchased. $170.00 to fix, why don't you purchase a "new pair" was suggested. I would suggest purchasing another manufacture than Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and sound
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing headphones. I mainly wear them for listening to music or audiobooks at home. The range is far; for example, I was able to leave my phone downstairs on the first floor and go into the third floor attic and still hear the audio. The wireless is great and it's wonderful to be able to do things around the house while listening to music hands and wire free. The sound quality is superb and the look is great. I love the rose gold color.
customer_reviews.author: kara c.

customer_reviews.title: Found a refurbished set of these and decided to take a shot since the price wasn't bad. I have NO experience with any other head
customer_reviews.text: Decided to move from wireless earbuds to wireless headphones. Found a refurbished set of these and decided to take a shot since the price wasn't bad. I have NO experience with any other headphones, wired or wireless, but I have been very happy with these. I think the audio sounds great, and the battery life is so much better than I'd expected. I I use them at work, sometimes all day, sometimes only hours at a time, but they've been perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Droozie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive doesn't mean quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect from such well-known firms which even a child knows. it got corrupted in two months, I was shock Bluetooth wouldn't work for this, and bought them so the cords are not dangling while walking or when doing sports. well, I had to return them back
customer_reviews.author: Yarik

customer_reviews.title: Are they really solo 2 ?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if these are solo 2 or not. The solo 2 should say solo 2. The beats solo 2 special edit reds are at Walmart for the same price. This is questionable !
customer_reviews.author: ofcmcaree

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift that operated smoothly and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, it was simple to link to both Apple and Android products. It is simple to operate either wired or wirelessly. Great sound. Folds up conveniently for storage. I recommend getting a hard case (it comes with a soft case) for it if you're the type to toss it in a gym bag or the back seat of a car - well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Wireless headphones with style
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these earphones for my daughter & she loves them. They work very well in Bluetooth mode as well as plugged in mode. The gold/white color is very stylish. They are also user friendly and easy to use. I realize that you are paying for the brand name, but I think they are overpriced.....hopefully they will last, & be worth it. We are satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HayStace

customer_reviews.title: this product is great. Sounds great and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered the on-ear and not the over-ear. Either way, this product is great. Sounds great and looks great. I wear it to the gym everyday. Simply wiping it down with a disinfecting wipe gets it clean. 4 stars because it does get quite uncomfortable to wear after some time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Regret buying these
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped quickly and the outer covering is coming off on both sides. Cheaply made and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hills

customer_reviews.title: Ouch...sadly, my ears hurt and I have a headache from wearing for an hour...
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband as a birthday gift and he wore them on a trip out west and realized they gave him a headache because of the ear cover component being too tight. He even tried to widen them by putting them on a styrofoam mannequin head to no avail. Worst part is I have missed the return window! Call me sad and disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jean A Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sound. My younger son likes it but the earphones fit too tight, so I cannot listen to more than 30 minutes. Also the battery charger cord tip was broken after one year use, but fortunately since other charger cords work this was not a problem. I wouldn't recommend and would buy a mini earphone instead in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Was reserved about buying Beats. I heard you are paying for the name and that early versions was not that great. However, the new Beats Solo 2 Wireless are great!! The sound is great and very comfortable. I tested the Bose and Sol Republic as well. Not a huge difference but liked the way the Beats felt on the ear better.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Phillips

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, worth the wait for them to arrive (kinda had a delay but not too bad). The wireless are perfect for around the house. The bluetooth range is actually pretty impressive and the sound quality is on point. Would buy again and again. Batter life lasts a long time and I can wear them for hours without them hurting my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Monaco

customer_reviews.title: If your buying headphones be sure to buy an extended warranty and expect some time going without to get them replaced or fixed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son November 18th 2015 they have since then broke twice. The first time I was able to ship them back and have them replaced or fixed. They broke again yet there isn't any information where I can replace them a second time. I thought they had a 2 year warranty but looks like it was only a year. I won't be buying beats again or at least not through Amazon as the return and the amount of time it takes to get the problem resolved isn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little flashy but sound quality and wireless feature is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the wireless feature. It's a little flashy so I wouldn't recommend wearing it in places that might be susceptible to theft. The wireless functionality is great and I rarely have to charge them. Sound quality is great and they're comfortable without falling off your head when you turn. Only thing is for people with long hair, might get caught on the sides so be aware of that. Otherwise, would recommend and buy as a gift for friends (if you're willing to spend that much).
customer_reviews.author: GottaHaveIt

customer_reviews.title: They work ok but I was expecting a much better sound quality from them
customer_reviews.text: They work ok but I was expecting a much better sound quality from them. I have owned them for several months now and they white foam is very hard to clean and it is now stained. Also the are lose on me know. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Color is Coral but looked Orange.
customer_reviews.text: No charger was included with this item. Several of the charges we tried to use would not work. Hope the charging port isn’t damaged. Earphones work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sets in the City

customer_reviews.title: I wish the ability to skip to the next song was a little better. You double tap to skip to the next ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish these headphones went down to a little smaller size. They are a little large and tend to slip off even at the smallest setting. Also, I wish the ability to skip to the next song was a little better. You double tap to skip to the next song, and single tap to pause the song. However, the headphones have difficulty discriminating between a double and single tap and always pause the music when I really just want to skip to the next song.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but...
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love these, but because they are on ear headphones they make my ears hurt if i wear them for over an hour. This can be a good thing because it will stop me from mindlessly sitting on my laptop for hours. They overall feel great, and have great sound quality. They also look so clean and symmetrical. I love that they are wireless and I can leave my phone somewhere and still listen to my music. I can also control them from my Apple Watch. So the only reason for four stars is because they make my ears hurt, but that may not be for everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It will break into pieces from the place of extension
customer_reviews.text: Please do NOT buy this. It is poorly constructed. The way it is manufactured, it is prone to breaking at the point of extension. It did for me after 3 months of using it. It is not worth the money you pay for it. Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dipes B.

customer_reviews.title: Good sounds but leaks way too much
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wear these in public because no matter how quiet my music is someone can still hear it. It makes me feel uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ElizabethRivers33

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Customer.
customer_reviews.text: What a great company! My boyfriend ordered me the SOLO2 instead of the Studio version for my bday. And it was so easy for me to get in contact and make my return and purchased my new earphones. I'm differently a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Darline xoxo

customer_reviews.title: No regrets buying these!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a year and I have zero regrets buying these. Easy to use. Stylish Soft on the ears Sounds amazing!!! My kids are always trying to borrow these from me. The Bluetooth rang is great!
customer_reviews.author: floorsnmore

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but cheaply manufactured made it useless.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones overall but one drop with this onto solid ground will break it, well for me this happened. I'm a dissapointed customer that never got to see a year with it.
customer_reviews.author: Illbuyforadollar

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice headphones. Began to have problems with shortage rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa-babe

customer_reviews.title: So if you need to use these with your phone I would recommend the Bose
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and the comparable Bose Sound link. The Beats have deeper bass and are a bit louder, but the microphone sounds really muffled and has low sound. The Bose mic is 10 times clearer. So if you need to use these with your phone I would recommend the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Somertime

customer_reviews.title: The best! The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought these for my hubby for Christmas 2015 he just loves them. He still use these to this very day when he is in the gym. He was surprised I even got them for him because he thinks I bought these at full price which I didnt. Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: NurseQueen

customer_reviews.title: and I get it but I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: beats gets a lot of shade for being too expensive, and I get it but I love these headphones, they have great sound quality, they are wireless which is awesome and they look really good, I use them when I am at the gym and have no problems with them falling down or anything
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: besides that phone works great.
customer_reviews.text: the white protection after 6 months came out, i had to bring to apple store to switch for another one, luck I'm it was in the garentee. besides that phone works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Headphone and great sound I only use it from time to time
customer_reviews.text: Stylish Headphone and great sound I only use it from time to time. Sometime i don't like a headphone while I'm working out but after a few months of using it, the right ear of the head phone stop working. Sorry to say I'm not buying it again .
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Stone

customer_reviews.title: They are great. Good sound
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these 4.5 stars I would. They are great. Good sound. Stylish. Love not having a cord. Comfortable. My only complaint would be that the sound quality is a little bit worse than some equivalently priced wired headphones but the trade off for wireless type action is so worth it for most applications. If these broke, I would buy them again but so far they have been great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: PJ not DJ

customer_reviews.title: great sound and wonderful fit
customer_reviews.text: I have upper ear rings and I had a bit of trouble adjusting to the pressure. But overall, great sound and wonderful fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

product_meta.title: Beats Solo2 Wireless On-Ear Headphone - Gold (Old Model)
feature_bullets: Pair and play with your Bluetooth device with 30 foot range
Fine-tuned acoustics for clarity, breadth and balance
12 hour rechargeable battery with fuel gauge
Take hands-free calls with built-in mic
What's in the box: Beats Solo2 Wireless on-ear headphone, carrying case, RemoteTalk cable, USB 2.0 charging cable (USB-A to USB Micro-B), Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
